channel.title: x86 on stardustman

item.title: asm-how-computer-startup
item.description: x86 架构计算机是如何启动的？ 16-bit Processors and Segmentation (1978) The IA-32 architecture family was preceded by 16-bit processors, the 8086 and 8088. The 8086 has 16-bit registers and a 16-bit external data bus, with 20-bit addressing giving a 1-MByte address space. The 8088 is similar to the 8086 except it has an 8-bit external data bus. The 8086/8088 introduced segmentation to

item.title: x86-64-architecture
item.description: 操作系统其实很大一部分面向 CPU 来编程的。一些 OS 的概念直接来源于 CPU 的术语，或者和 CPU 关联性非常大。要想彻底理解 OS ，无法绕过 CPU。因为 Intel 的 X86(Intel 80386 之后
